languages.text: "Both you and I know that a raid is coming, {name}. It was only recently that we confronted the Archon of the Black Heart... The new challenge may prove to be even more arduous. One that requires greater mastery over death. One that is even more... draining." {n}Marazhai casts a hungry eye over the assembled crowd.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И ты, и я знаем — грядет рейд, {name}. Только недавно мы противостояли архонту Черного сердца... и новое испытание может обернуться еще более тяжелым. Еще более требовательным к мастерству смерти. Еще более... иссушающим". {n}Маражай окидывает голодным взглядом толпу вокруг.{/n}

One that requires greater mastery over death. One that is even more... draining." {n}Marazhai casts a hungry eye over the assembled crowd.{/n}

languages.text: "И ты, и я знаем — грядет рейд, {name}. Только недавно мы противостояли архонту Черного сердца... и новое испытание может обернуться еще более тяжелым. Еще более требовательным к мастерству смерти. Еще более... иссушающим". {n}Маражай окидывает голодным взглядом толпу вокруг.{/n}
“你我都很清楚，另一场劫掠即将到来，{name}。与黑心阴谋团执政官的对垒才刚刚结束……新的挑战只会更加艰巨。这场战斗需要足以蔑视死亡的掌控力，而且恐怕会有更大的……损耗。”{n}玛拉斋朝聚集的人群投去饥渴的一瞥。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Both you and I know that a raid is coming, {name}. It was only recently that we confronted the Archon of the Black Heart... The new challenge may prove to be even more arduous. One that requires greater mastery over death. One that is even more... draining." {n}Marazhai casts a hungry eye over the assembled crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你我都很清楚，另一场劫掠即将到来，{name}。与黑心阴谋团执政官的对垒才刚刚结束……新的挑战只会更加艰巨。这场战斗需要足以蔑视死亡的掌控力，而且恐怕会有更大的……损耗。”{n}玛拉斋朝聚集的人群投去饥渴的一瞥。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Tú y yo sabemos que se avecina una incursión, {name}. No hace mucho que nos enfrentamos al arconte del Corazón Negro... Este nuevo desafío puede ser aún más arduo. Quizá requiera un mayor dominio sobre la muerte. Algo aún más... sanguinario». {n}Marazhai mira con expresión voraz a la multitud congregada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Both you and I know that a raid is coming, {name}. It was only recently that we confronted the Archon of the Black Heart... The new challenge may prove to be even more arduous. One that requires greater mastery over death. One that is even more... draining." {n}Marazhai casts a hungry eye over the assembled crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tú y yo sabemos que se avecina una incursión, {name}. No hace mucho que nos enfrentamos al arconte del Corazón Negro... Este nuevo desafío puede ser aún más arduo. Quizá requiera un mayor dominio sobre la muerte. Algo aún más... sanguinario». {n}Marazhai mira con expresión voraz a la multitud congregada.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Vous savez aussi bien que moi qu'un raid est imminent, {name}. Cela fait peu de temps que nous avons affronté l'archonte du Cœur Noir... Ce nouveau défi s'annonce bien plus ardu. Il réclame une maîtrise absolue de la mort. Il sera encore plus... exigeant. » {n}Marazhai jette un regard avide vers la foule rassemblée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Both you and I know that a raid is coming, {name}. It was only recently that we confronted the Archon of the Black Heart... The new challenge may prove to be even more arduous. One that requires greater mastery over death. One that is even more... draining." {n}Marazhai casts a hungry eye over the assembled crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez aussi bien que moi qu'un raid est imminent, {name}. Cela fait peu de temps que nous avons affronté l'archonte du Cœur Noir... Ce nouveau défi s'annonce bien plus ardu. Il réclame une maîtrise absolue de la mort. Il sera encore plus... exigeant. » {n}Marazhai jette un regard avide vers la foule rassemblée.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Wir beide wissen, dass ein Angriff bevorsteht, {name}. Es ist nicht lange her, dass wir uns dem Archon des Schwarzen Herzens gestellt haben ... Die neue Herausforderung könnte sich als noch beschwerlicher herausstellen. Eine Herausforderung, die eine größere Herrschaft über den Tod erfordert. Und die noch ... viel mehr Energie kostet." {n}Marazhai wirft einen hungrigen Blick auf die Menge.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Both you and I know that a raid is coming, {name}. It was only recently that we confronted the Archon of the Black Heart... The new challenge may prove to be even more arduous. One that requires greater mastery over death. One that is even more... draining." {n}Marazhai casts a hungry eye over the assembled crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir beide wissen, dass ein Angriff bevorsteht, {name}. Es ist nicht lange her, dass wir uns dem Archon des Schwarzen Herzens gestellt haben ... Die neue Herausforderung könnte sich als noch beschwerlicher herausstellen. Eine Herausforderung, die eine größere Herrschaft über den Tod erfordert. Und die noch ... viel mehr Energie kostet." {n}Marazhai wirft einen hungrigen Blick auf die Menge.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「俺もお前も、襲撃が近づいていることを知ってる。そうだろう、{name}。黒き心臓のアーコンと対峙したのはつい最近のことだ…新たな挑戦は、さらに困難なものになるかもしれない。死に対する、より高い習熟が求められる。もっと…消耗するようなものがな」{n}マラズハイは、集まった群衆へと飢えた眼差しを向ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Both you and I know that a raid is coming, {name}. It was only recently that we confronted the Archon of the Black Heart... The new challenge may prove to be even more arduous. One that requires greater mastery over death. One that is even more... draining." {n}Marazhai casts a hungry eye over the assembled crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「俺もお前も、襲撃が近づいていることを知ってる。そうだろう、{name}。黒き心臓のアーコンと対峙したのはつい最近のことだ…新たな挑戦は、さらに困難なものになるかもしれない。死に対する、より高い習熟が求められる。もっと…消耗するようなものがな」{n}マラズハイは、集まった群衆へと飢えた眼差しを向ける。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "İkimiz de biliyoruz ki baskın yaklaşıyor {name}. Kara Yürek Arkonu ile yüzleşmemizin üzerinden çok geçmedi. Bu yeni mücadele, ötekinden çok daha zorlu olabilir. Ölüm üzerinde muazzam bir üstünlük kurmayı gerektiren, daha da... Yorucu bir mücadele olabilir." {n}Marazhai, toplanan kalabalığa açlıkla göz gezdiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Both you and I know that a raid is coming, {name}. It was only recently that we confronted the Archon of the Black Heart... The new challenge may prove to be even more arduous. One that requires greater mastery over death. One that is even more... draining." {n}Marazhai casts a hungry eye over the assembled crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İkimiz de biliyoruz ki bir baskın yaklaşıyor {name}. Kara Yürek Arkonu ile yüzleşmemizin üzerinden çok geçmedi. Bu yeni mücadele, ötekinden çok daha zorlu çıkabilir. Ölüm üzerinde muazzam bir üstünlük kurmayı gerektiren, daha da... Yorucu bir mücadele olabilir." {n}Marazhai, toplanan kalabalığa açlıkla göz gezdiriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
